attributes.action: abolish stamp duty for first time buyers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: First time buyers struggle enough to puchase their first property. Regional prices also make buying more difficult, especially with London prices. With stamp duty added to London prices how are first time buyers ever to make that first step?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
